name: Publicly Accessible RDS with no/old TLS
query: { dbInstances( where: { AND: [ { publicAccessBlocked: false } { securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } } } { OR: [ { tlsStatus: "" } { tlsStatus: "disabled" } { tlsMinimumVersion_LT: 1.2 } ] } ] } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
